backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend canister with CRUD operations for products, suppliers, and orders, including search, filtering, profit calculation, and order status management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five main features (product catalog, order management, supplier management, dashboard metrics, profit calculation) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the DropShip Pro application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens for the application theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, Products, Orders, and Suppliers pages wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/AddProductForm.t: Form component for adding new products with fields for name, description, supplier selection, wholesale price, and retail price using React hooks and shadcn/ui components.
Form component for adding new suppliers with name and contact information fields, using the useAddSupplier hook for backend integration.
Form component for creating new orders with product selection, quantity input, and customer name fields. Uses React hooks for state management and mutations to submit order data.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component providing navigation header with dashboard, products, orders, and suppliers links, plus a footer with branding. Uses TanStack Router for navigation and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MetricCard.tsx: Reusable card component for displaying dashboard metrics with title, value, icon, optional description, and trend indicator.
frontend/src/components/OrderCard.tsx: Displays individual order details including customer info, product, quantity, pricing, profit calculation, and status with dropdown for updating order status.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Badge component that displays order status (pending, processing, shipped, delivered) with appropriate styling variants.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component displaying product information including name, description, supplier, wholesale/retail prices, and calculated profit margin.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Search input component with icon for filtering products by name or description.
frontend/src/components/SupplierCard.tsx: Card component showing supplier details including name, contact info, and list of associated products with count badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardMetrics.t: Hook aggregating data from products, orders, and suppliers to calculate dashboard metrics like total products, active orders, pending orders, revenue, and supplier count.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all orders, creating new orders, and updating order status with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exports hooks for fetching products with debounced search, retrieving individual products by ID, and adding new products with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal file that imports useActor and notes that feature-specific query hooks are organized in separate files.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppliers.ts: Provides hooks for fetching all suppliers, individual suppliers by ID, supplier products, and adding new suppliers with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying business metrics (products, orders, revenue) with MetricCard components, quick stats, and a getting started guide.
frontend/src/pages/Orders.tsx: Orders page with status filtering, order creation dialog, and displays OrderCard components for each order with empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products page with search functionality, add product dialog, and displays ProductCard components in a grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Suppliers.tsx: Suppliers page with add supplier dialog that displays SupplierCard components in a grid with loading and empty state handling.
frontend/src/utils/profitCalculations.ts: Utility functions for calculating profit margin between wholesale and retail prices, and total order profit based on quantity.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file for DropShip Pro application defining six implemented features: product catalog, order management, supplier management, dashboard with metrics, profit calculation, and modern UI design with warm color palette.
